docs.lead_paragraph: He had been plowing the rocky soil of the Jezreel Valley since dawn, and now, with the sun overhead, the 19-year-old farmer-soldier saw the Arabs coming at him with clubs and knives.

headline.main: Moshe Dayan Reflections on A Life of War and Peace; Mortality Friendly Enemies DAYAN A Personal Paradox The Warrior A Changing Land The Politician DAYAN The Past Lives

docs.abstract: Curtis Bill Pepper interview with former Israeli Foreign Min Moshe Dayan; Dayan discusses his private and public lives, changes that have overtaken Israel and his plan for Palestinian autonomy; illustrations (L)
docs.snippet: He had been plowing the rocky soil of the Jezreel Valley since dawn, and now, with the sun overhead, the 19-year-old farmer-soldier saw the Arabs coming at him with clubs and knives.
